argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tdeglem.a | |- A = { m e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' m " NN ) e. Fin } |
| 2 |  | tdeglem.h | |- H = ( h e. A |-> ( CCfld gsum h ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_cnfld0 | |- 0 = ( 0g ` CCfld ) |
| 4 |  | #P_cnring | |- CCfld e. Ring |
| 5 |  | #P_ringcmn | |- ( CCfld e. Ring -> CCfld e. CMnd ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_mp1i | |- ( ( I e. V /\ h e. A ) -> CCfld e. CMnd ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( I e. V /\ h e. A ) -> I e. V ) |
| 8 |  | #P_nn0subm | |- NN0 e. ( SubMnd ` CCfld ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( I e. V /\ h e. A ) -> NN0 e. ( SubMnd ` CCfld ) ) |
| 10 | 1 | #P_psrbagf | |- ( ( I e. V /\ h e. A ) -> h : I --> NN0 ) |
| 11 | 1 | #P_psrbagfsupp | |- ( ( h e. A /\ I e. V ) -> h finSupp 0 ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( I e. V /\ h e. A ) -> h finSupp 0 ) |
| 13 | 3, 6, 7, 9, 10, 12 | #P_gsumsubmcl | |- ( ( I e. V /\ h e. A ) -> ( CCfld gsum h ) e. NN0 ) |
| 14 | 13, 2 | #P_fmptd | |- ( I e. V -> H : A --> NN0 ) |
